PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^6===Notes===
^7Since PoB is not updated, the new lightning mastery "Shocks you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 10" is not in pob yet, so replace the lightning chain mastery with the new one in game.
^6===IMPORTANT: SOLVING MANA ISSUES===
^7Lightning Conduit has very high mana costs, to off set this you will need to use Eldritch Battery. Along with EB you will need some crafts on gear: -regen 150 es near rare/unique mobs -minus mana cost rings -energy shield recharge rate on gloves/helm/boots
EQUIP DISCIPLINE EARLY IF YOU HAVE ANY MANA ISSUES
^6===Applying Shock===
^7Orb of Storms will be the way this build applies shock, so you cast orb of storms, it shocks an enemy, then you cast lightning conduit and this will cause orb of storms to hit again so you can keep casting lightning conduit.
You can also try skills like storm brand / whatever other skill that will constantly hit for single target if you prefer that.
^6===Other Notes===
^6^7Thunderfist should be a very good pair of unique gloves early on for linking your lightning conduit in, specifically before you have a 6 link
Berek's Grip will be good for leech, if you don't have a berek's grip you can get leech on your gloves with eldritch currency

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^6(Damage Adjustments for Conduit)^7 shock nova deals 13% more damage shock nova has 30% more cast speed shock nova deals 110% more damage (55% shock)
^6(Get res and stats on your gear im too lazy to put it in pob)^7
+80 to dexterity +20 to strength
